title: The Red Diary - The Re(a)d Diary
description:
The Red Diary: The Re(a)d Diary Flipbook
by Teddy Kristiansen & Steven T. Seagle (Authors)
Publisher: Image Comics (August 28, 2012)


A BOLD EXPERIMENT IN THE GRAPHIC NOVEL! Kristiansen's European Album is newly translated to English by the Eisner nominated/winning team behind the acclaimed Vertigo graphic novel, It's a Bird, Teddy Kristiansen and Steven T. Seagle, but in a unique flip-novel format that also "re-mixes" with a completely different script devised by Seagle before he collaborated on the translation. Both versions - The Red Diary, a tale of art forgery and World War, and The Re[a]d Diary, a tale of identity theft and lost love - comprise this unique graphic novel.


CBZ format / 146 pages in total
Language - English


To view CBZ files download CDisplay here - http://www.cdisplay.me/
